2. Late Entry & Early Exit Policy

2.1

Edit policy

This new policy will be effective from 15th Jun 2022 onwards.

Edit policy

Edit policy

 Every X late mark in a month will be marked as Half Day, after that every X late mark will be marked as Absent.

Edit policy
